column5: Seems I have a long overdue date with the scalpel. With any luck I'll be back in a week giving everyone grief.
We'll be waiting for the grief..good luck.
You take care of yourself and get us some news as soon as you can.
All the best for a speedy recovery! Jim
Good luck with the operation and a speedy recovery!
Thoughts are with you today Bruce.  A quick tune up and oil change and you will be good to go. Just make sure you take it easy when you are on the mend.  All the best, Steve
Dont forget about the purty nurses too.LOL  See ya when ya get back Bruce.
Good Luck with the procedure Big Guy!!!  Hope you feel much better when all is done and healed!!!  I know the Perch and 'Gills are breathing a sigh of relief for now!
Best wishes to you Bruce, I hope it all goes well and smoothly.
Good luck to you Bruce.... wish you a speedy recovery Jacques
Best Wishes Bruce and may you have a speedy recovery.

I'm Baaack  Thank you for your best wishes. It was  nice to read when I got home.  Been home 2 hours and now catching up on the important things.. Fishing  Had 2 really rough days, but things started turning around fast yesterday.  The Dr. managed to remove a lot of the tissue build up around the spinal cord, but the  recovery process is going to be lengthy. Don't have much feeling in the legs and I rather unsteady,but heck, I just got home.  As for the purdy nurses, I got the ones with the purdy finger bobbles. The nurses were top flight and professional and a pleasure to deal with.
Welcome back Bruce, sounds like things went OK? You'll be runnin' after those purdy nurses in no time. Get well soon!
Glad to hear your home Bruce, it's always a better feeling to recoop at home with loved ones.  If you need anything just give me a shout.
